label: Musical Theater
description: Performing arts productions that combine singing, dancing, and acting to tell a story.

subcategories.label: Grease
subcategories.description: A popular musical set in the 1950s that follows the romantic relationship between two high school students.

subcategories.label: Mary Poppins
subcategories.description: A classic musical about a magical nanny who helps a family in London.

subcategories.label: Phantom of the Opera
subcategories.description: A gothic romance musical about a mysterious figure who haunts the Paris Opera House.

subcategories.label: Moulin Rouge
subcategories.description: A musical set in Paris in the early 1900s that follows a young writer who falls in love with a cabaret actress.

subcategories.label: Les Miserables
subcategories.description: A musical set in 19th century France that follows the story of Jean Valjean, a former convict who seeks redemption.
